EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-03-13-Cloud Migration Webinar Customer Send.Customer Send
EmailTemplate.subject: [Live Webinar] 3 Ways to Accelerate and De-Risk Your Cloud Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloud_migration_webinar]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
You wouldn’t build a house with a plan that’s only 80% accurate.
So the next time you perform a cloud migration, why trust a cloud migration plan that doesn’t deliver exactly the performance your applications need in the cloud, at the optimal cost?
Turbonomic’s cloud migration planning capabilities can save you the pain of guessing your way into the cloud and suffering the inevitable consequences – ballooning costs, performance problems, and manual troubleshooting.
Please join our live webinar on Thursday March 22nd at 1PM ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloud_migration_webinar]]> to learn how Turbonomic customers like you are radically accelerating AND de-risking their cloud migrations to drive continuous cloud optimization.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloud_migration_webinar]]>
We hope to see you there!
Best, The Turbonomic Team
